AddSheet.description:
DPROPERTYSHEET [Client] Adds a new tab.

[string] name
  Name of the tab

[Panel] pnl
  Panel to be used as contents of the tab. This normally should be a DPanel

[string] icon=nil
  Icon for the tab. This will ideally be a silkicon, but any material name can be used.

[boolean] noStretchX=false
  Should DPropertySheet try to fill itself with given panel horizontally.

[boolean] noStretchY=false
  Should DPropertySheet try to fill itself with given panel vertically.

[string] tooltip=nil
  Tooltip for the tab when user hovers over it with his cursor

CloseTab.description:
DPROPERTYSHEET [Client] Removes tab and/or panel from the parent DPropertySheet.

[Panel] tab
  The DTab of the sheet from DPropertySheet.

See DPropertySheet:GetItems.

[boolean] removePanel
  Set to true to remove the associated panel object as well.

OnActiveTabChanged.description:
DPROPERTYSHEET [Client] 

[Panel] old
  The previously active DTab

[Panel] new
  The newly active DTab

SetActiveTab.description:
DPROPERTYSHEET [Client] 

[Panel] tab
  The DTab to set active.

See DPropertySheet:GetItems

SetFadeTime.description:
DPROPERTYSHEET [Client] Sets the amount of time (in seconds) it takes to fade between tabs.

[number] time=0.1
  The amount of time it takes (in seconds) to fade between tabs.

SetupCloseButton.description:
DPROPERTYSHEET [Client] 

[function] func
  Callback function to be called when the close button is pressed.

SwitchToName.description:
DPROPERTYSHEET [Client] 

[string] name
  Case sensitive name of the tab.
